text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
something cold was gently placed
on [Player]'s cheek.

name: Kiloc
text:
Yo, good work.
If you stay here like this, you'll catch a heat stroke.
Drink some water, [Player]-chan.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, it's just a little something.
You've helped me a lot, [Player]-chan.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahahaha!
Sorry for surprising you.
But, [Player]-chan,
you have a really cute reaction, you know that?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I suppose I caught something. Just now—
A big catch named [Player]-chan, huh?
Hahahaha!

name: Kiloc
text:
The calendar photoshoot
has finished its first phase,
so I'm taking a short break now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's why, I and the others just can't leave you alone.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
It's rare to leave Estevolta with such fanfare.
I intend to enjoy it to the fullest!

options.text: You were really into the photoshoot.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah.
When Saotome-san told me it was for revitalizing the region, even a carefree captain like me gets excited.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides, if someone who saw my photo got smitten and contacted me... Hehehe.
—Ah, no, ahem. Never mind.

name: Kiloc
text:
By the way, you're also on break, right?
If you like, why don't we play together
at Enoshima's beach!

name: Kiloc
text:
We can go fishing as we are,
or [Player]-chan, I can accompany
in whatever you'd like— Alright?

options.text: I need to prepare before I get to enjoy myself.
Kiloc, do you use things like this?

name: Kiloc
text:
Oh—, is this sun oil?
It's an Enoshima specialty, right?
I saw it at the concession stand earlier.

name: Kiloc
text:
The sun is especially strong today,
so it might be good to apply it.
Then, if I'm thinking of what you've got in mind...

name: Kiloc
text:
You showed me that sun oil, which means
I can assume that you will apply
it for me, right, [Player]-chan?

name: Kiloc
text:
—Whoa, really!?
So it was worth asking, even if it's a long shot.
I'm counting on you, [Player]-chan!

name: Kiloc
text:
Hehe, I didn't expect
to get a reward from you
so soon.

name: Kiloc
text:
Ah—, I feel good.
Just me and a cute fella on Earth's sea,
isn't this just the best?

name: Kiloc
text:
Oh! You're even giving me a massage?
Nice, that's quite a service.
It was worth working hard!

name: Kiloc
text:
Whoaah!?
To think you're even doing that much,
you're bold, [Player]-chan!

[Player] and Kiloc enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Kiloc
text:
—Thanks.
I really got to have the
best time of my life, [Player]-chan.

name: Kiloc
text:
Well then, it's my turn now.
I won't let you say "I'll pass", okay?
Come on, lie down and leave yourself to me.
